content: double_crochet-front 1 double_crochet in corner chain space * 1 double_crochet in each st and chain space until the corner chain space in the corner chain space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the last corner chain space perform a half_double_crochet join to the top chain of the round chain 3 and turn repeat rounds 2-7 until desired size is achieved copyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya video tutorial available on youtube designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for @juantheyarnaddict personal use only it may not be reproduced distributed or sold without the express written please like/share/subscribe permission of the designer finished items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit the designer social media juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juan the yarn addict and friends jtya designs be sure to check out more of my designs… patterns on ravelry and etsy tutorials on youtube if specified weekender tote bag shawl for all tutorial on youtube rhythm of resilience tutorial on youtube novacrest star blanket tutorial on youtube
